programme.title: What If: Planet Earth
programme.sub-title: 50 Percent Off: Halved Worlds
programme.desc: Imagine a world split in half! Dive into scenarios where planets, moons, and entire systems are halved.

programme.title: What If: Planet Earth
programme.sub-title: 5 Seconds that Could Change the World
programme.desc: Explore catastrophic scenarios where Earth stops spinning, drops to absolute zero, and loses oxygen.

programme.title: What If: Planet Earth
programme.sub-title: Earth Daze: An World in Reverse
programme.desc: Journey through a world turned upside down! Explore the bizarre effects of Earth reversing its course.

programme.title: What If: Planet Earth
programme.sub-title: Let it snow
programme.desc: Embrace the winter wonderland as we dive into the science of snow, its beauty, and extreme conditions.

programme.title: What If: Body
programme.sub-title: Folks are Weird: Living Boneless, Forever, and With Moldy Diets
programme.desc: Delve into bizarre hypothetical lifestyles, from boneless humans to eternal life and mold-infused diets.

programme.title: What If: Humanity
programme.sub-title: Diner's Club: Food Choices that Can Change Everything
programme.desc: Explore the power of food and how the choices we make at the table can transform health and culture.

programme.title: What If: Body
programme.sub-title: Standstill: Long Sleeps and Frozen Worlds
programme.desc: Explore the concept of time frozen in place, from deep hibernation to icy worlds that in perpetual stillness.

programme.title: What If: Body
programme.sub-title: Might As Well Jump
programme.desc: Leap into adventure as we explore the thrilling science and history of jumping into most unusual places.

programme.title: What If: Body
programme.sub-title: Icy What You Did There
programme.desc: Chill with us as we experiment with dry ice, hot ice, and more, uncovering cool science and frosty fun!

programme.title: What If: Aliens
programme.sub-title: Out of this world: Exploring Alien Life
programme.desc: Venture beyond Earth to uncover the possibilities of alien life.

programme.sub-title: Life, Not As We Know It
programme.desc: Discover the possibilities of alien biology and life forms beyond our imagination.

programme.title: What If: Aliens
programme.sub-title: Hello Goodbye: Zombie Survival, Alien Contact, and Life on Mars
programme.desc: Navigate the challenges of zombie outbreaks, first contact with aliens, and the reality of surviving on Mars!

programme.title: What If: Cosmos
programme.sub-title: A Star Is Born: Changing Orbits and the Birth of a New Star
programme.desc: Experience the cosmic dance of changing orbits that leads to the birth of a new star.
